matador_BusinessLogic

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • matador_BusinessLogic.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    Provides a Player that is used in a dice game. The Player hold a name, points, carColor, balance and twelveLastTime. Provides necessary functions used by the Game class.
    Author:
    Martin Caspersen
    See Also:
    Game

      Constructs a Player with the provided name, carColor and balance.

      • Player

        public Player(String name,
      int carColor,
      int balance)
        Constructs a Player with the provided name, carColor and balance.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the Player as a String.
        carColor - int describing the color of this Players car [0:5].
        balance - initial balance of the Player as an int.

        Sets whether or not the Player rolled two sixes.

        twelveLastTime - boolean, true if the Player rolled two sixes.
